reviewText:
OK,Not sure why I received this dvd to review ,But,It was amazingly informative about proper strings needed and finger placement for chords.
Some hi-lites:
Close-ups of Chords,Scales and Licks.
Music Tabs on every exercise.
Two songs just available for you to practice on.
Really recommend to anyone that just wants to play around with their first guitar ,Or Those Old `Rock and Roll' farts who play the Dive Bars and need a refresher course,Please.

I've messed around trying to play guitar before, but never got very far. After having gone through this dvd I can't believe how much I've progressed in such a short time. Can't wait to get my hands on the next release in the series.
